overview: One day in 1984, Todd Bowden, a brilliant high school boy fascinated by the history of Nazism, stumbles across an old man whose appearance resembles that of Kurt Dussander, a wanted Nazi war criminal. A month later, Todd decides to knock on his door.
tagline: If you don't believe in the existence of evil, you've got a lot to learn
cast: Brad Renfro|Ian McKellen|Bruce Davison|Elias Koteas|Joe Morton
